languages.text: {n}Конечно, в первую встречу Каллигос Винтерскейл предстал перед вами в более выгодном свете, однако за слоем запекшейся крови и грязи от вас не ускользает странная деталь — Вольный Торговец не выглядит ни раненным, ни изможденным. Проведя в диких лесах Кетца Темера добрые тридцать дней, Винтерскейл лишь сменил ослепительную улыбку на зловещий оскал, залитый кровью врагов.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Конечно, в первую встречу Каллигос Винтерскейл предстал перед вами в более выгодном свете, однако за слоем запекшейся крови и грязи от вас не ускользает странная деталь — Вольный Торговец не выглядит ни раненным, ни изможденным. Проведя в диких лесах Кетца-аль Хета добрые тридцать дней, Винтерскейл лишь сменил ослепительную улыбку на зловещий оскал, залитый кровью врагов.{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: {n}Unsurprisingly, at your first meeting, Calligos Winterscale appeared before you in a more favourable light. However, under the layer of dried blood and dirt, you still notice a strange detail — the Rogue Trader appears neither wounded nor exhausted. Having spent a good thirty nights in the forests of Quetza Temer, Winterscale has merely swapped his dazzling smile for a feral grin and drenched himself in the blood of his enemies.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Конечно, в первую встречу Каллигос Винтерскейл предстал перед вами в более выгодном свете, однако за слоем запекшейся крови и грязи от вас не ускользает странная деталь — Вольный Торговец не выглядит ни раненным, ни изможденным. Проведя в диких лесах Кетца Темера добрые тридцать дней, Винтерскейл лишь сменил ослепительную улыбку на зловещий оскал, залитый кровью врагов.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Of course, on your first meeting Calligos Winterscale appeared before you in a more favourable light, though under the layer of dried blood and dirt a strange detail fails to escape you — the Rogue Trader appears neither wounded nor exhausted. Having spent a good thirty nights in the forests of Quetza Temera, Winterscale merely changed his dazzling smile for a sinister grin, soaked in the blood of his enemies.{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: {n}Of course, on your first meeting Calligos Winterscale appeared before you in a more favourable light, though under the layer of dried blood and dirt a strange detail fails to escape you — the Rogue Trader appears neither wounded nor exhausted. Having spent a good thirty nights in the forests of Quetza Temera, Winterscale merely changed his dazzling smile for a sinister grin, soaked in the blood of his enemies.{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: {n}Of course, on your first meeting Calligos Winterscale appeared before you in a more favourable light, though under the layer of dried blood and dirt, a strange detail fails to escape you — the Rogue Trader appears neither wounded nor exhausted. Having spent a good thirty nights in the forests of Quetza Temer, Winterscale merely changed his dazzling smile for a sinister grin, soaked in the blood of his enemies.{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: {n}Of course, on your first meeting Calligos Winterscale appeared before you in a more favourable light, though under the layer of dried blood and dirt, a strange detail fails to escape you — the Rogue Trader appears neither wounded nor exhausted. Having spent a good thirty nights in the forests of Quetza Temer, Winterscale merely changed his dazzling smile for a sinister grin, soaked in the blood of his enemies.{/n}

However, under the layer of dried blood and dirt, you still notice a strange detail — the Rogue Trader appears neither wounded nor exhausted. Having spent a good thirty nights in the forests of Quetza Temer, Winterscale has merely swapped his dazzling smile for a feral grin and drenched himself in the blood of his enemies.{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: {n}Unsurprisingly, at your first meeting, Calligos Winterscale appeared before you in a more favourable light. However, under the layer of dried blood and dirt, you still notice a strange detail — the Rogue Trader appears neither wounded nor exhausted. Having spent a good thirty nights in the forests of Quetza Temer, Winterscale has merely swapped his dazzling smile for a feral grin and drenched himself in the blood of his enemies.{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: {n}Como cabría esperar, cuando conociste a Calligos Winterscale te causó una impresión más favorable; aun así, a pesar de las manchas de tierra y sangre seca, adviertes un detalle curioso: el Comerciante Independiente no parece estar herido ni cansado. Tras haber pasado treinta días con sus noches en los bosques de Quetza Temer, Winterscale solamente ha cambiado su radiante sonrisa por una mueca salvaje y se ha salpicado de la sangre de sus enemigos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Unsurprisingly, at your first meeting, Calligos Winterscale appeared before you in a more favourable light. However, under the layer of dried blood and dirt, you still notice a strange detail — the Rogue Trader appears neither wounded nor exhausted. Having spent a good thirty nights in the forests of Quetza Temer, Winterscale has merely swapped his dazzling smile for a feral grin and drenched himself in the blood of his enemies.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Evidentemente, cuando conociste a Calligos Winterscale te causó una impresión más favorable; aun así, a pesar de las manchas de tierra y sangre seca, adviertes un detalle curioso: el Comerciante Independiente no parece estar herido ni cansado. Tras haber pasado treinta días con sus noches en los bosques de Quetza Temer, Winterscale solamente ha cambiado su radiante sonrisa por un rictus siniestro salpicado de la sangre de sus enemigos.{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: {n}你们第一次见面的时候，当时的卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔看起来比现在光鲜得多，如今他全身罩着一层干涸的血迹和尘土。不过，你并没有错过他身上某个古怪的细节——这位行商浪人既没有受伤，也没有感到疲惫。尽管他在格扎尔特默的森林里度过了整整三十个夜晚，但也仅仅是让他灿烂的笑容变成了浸透了敌人鲜血的狂野狞笑，别无其他。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Unsurprisingly, at your first meeting, Calligos Winterscale appeared before you in a more favourable light. However, under the layer of dried blood and dirt, you still notice a strange detail — the Rogue Trader appears neither wounded nor exhausted. Having spent a good thirty nights in the forests of Quetza Temer, Winterscale has merely swapped his dazzling smile for a feral grin and drenched himself in the blood of his enemies.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你们第一次见面的时候，当时的卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔看起来比现在光鲜得多，如今他全身罩着一层干涸的血迹和尘土。不过，你并没有错过他身上某个古怪的细节——这位行商浪人既没有受伤，也没有感到疲惫。尽管他在格扎尔特默的森林里度过了整整三十个夜晚，但也仅仅是让他灿烂的笑容变成了浸透了敌人鲜血的邪恶狞笑，别无其他。{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: {n}Évidemment, lors de votre première rencontre, Calligos Winterscale vous était apparu sous un jour plus favorable. Sous la couche de sang séché et de crasse, vous remarquez tout de même un détail étrange : le libre-marchand ne semble ni blessé ni fatigué. Après une trentaine de nuits passées dans les forêts de Quetza Temer, il a simplement troqué son sourire étincelant contre un rictus sauvage, maculé du sang de ses ennemis.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Unsurprisingly, at your first meeting, Calligos Winterscale appeared before you in a more favourable light. However, under the layer of dried blood and dirt, you still notice a strange detail — the Rogue Trader appears neither wounded nor exhausted. Having spent a good thirty nights in the forests of Quetza Temer, Winterscale has merely swapped his dazzling smile for a feral grin and drenched himself in the blood of his enemies.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Évidemment, la première fois que vous avez rencontré Calligos Winterscale, il vous est apparu sous un jour plus favorable. Cependant, sous la couche de sang séché et de crasse, vous remarquez un détail étrange : le libre-marchand ne semble ni blessé ni fatigué. Après une trentaine de nuits passées dans les forêts de Quetza Temer, il a simplement troqué son sourire étincelant contre un rictus sinistre, maculé du sang de ses ennemis.{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: {n}もちろん、カリゴス・ウィンタースケールは初めて会ったとき、もっと好ましい雰囲気をまとっていた。しかし乾いた血と汚れの層の下に潜む奇妙さをあなたは見逃さなかった …自由開拓者は、負傷も疲弊もしていないようだった。ケツァ・テメルの森で30日間も夜を過ごしたウィンタースケールは、敵の血に染まった眩しい笑みを凶暴な笑みに変えただけだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Unsurprisingly, at your first meeting, Calligos Winterscale appeared before you in a more favourable light. However, under the layer of dried blood and dirt, you still notice a strange detail — the Rogue Trader appears neither wounded nor exhausted. Having spent a good thirty nights in the forests of Quetza Temer, Winterscale has merely swapped his dazzling smile for a feral grin and drenched himself in the blood of his enemies.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}もちろん、カリゴス・ウィンタースケールは初めて会ったとき、もっと好ましい雰囲気をまとっていた。しかし乾いた血と汚れの層の下に潜む奇妙さをあなたは見逃さなかった …自由開拓者は、負傷も疲弊もしていないようだった。ケツァ・テメルの森で30日間も夜を過ごしたウィンタースケールは、敵の血に染まった眩しい笑みを凶暴な笑みに変えただけだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: {n}Bei eurer ersten Begegnung war Calligos Winterzunder natürlich in einem günstigeren Licht vor dir erschienen. Doch unter der dicken Schicht aus getrocknetem Blut und Schmutz bemerkst du ein merkwürdiges Detail — der Freihändler wirkt weder verwundet noch erschöpft. Nachdem er gute dreißig Nächte in den Wäldern von Quetza Temer verbracht hat, hat Winterzunder nur sein strahlendes Lächeln gegen ein animalisches Grinsen eingetauscht und sich mit dem Blut seiner Feinde getränkt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Unsurprisingly, at your first meeting, Calligos Winterscale appeared before you in a more favourable light. However, under the layer of dried blood and dirt, you still notice a strange detail — the Rogue Trader appears neither wounded nor exhausted. Having spent a good thirty nights in the forests of Quetza Temer, Winterscale has merely swapped his dazzling smile for a feral grin and drenched himself in the blood of his enemies.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bei eurer ersten Begegnung war Calligos Winterzunder natürlich in einem günstigeren Licht vor dir erschienen, auch wenn dir unter der dicken Schicht aus getrocknetem Blut und Schmutz ein merkwürdiges Detail nicht entgeht — der Freihändler wirkt weder verwundet noch erschöpft. Nachdem er gute dreißig Nächte in den Wäldern von Quetza Temer verbracht hat, hat Winterzunder nur sein strahlendes Lächeln gegen ein düsteres Grinsen eingetauscht, mit dem Blut seiner Feinde getränkt.{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: {n}Tam da beklendiği üzere Calligos Winterscale'in ilk karşılaşmanızda daha olumlu bir havası vardı. Ancak kurumuş kan ve pislik katmanlarının altında tuhaf bir ayrıntı fark ediyorsun. Hür Tacir, ne yaralı ne de bitkin görünüyor. Quetza Temer'de rahat otuz gece geçirmesine rağmen Winterscale'de tek değişen, baş döndürücü gülümsemesinin yerini alan vahşi bir sırıtış ve kendini düşmanlarının kanına bulaması olmuş.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Unsurprisingly, at your first meeting, Calligos Winterscale appeared before you in a more favourable light. However, under the layer of dried blood and dirt, you still notice a strange detail — the Rogue Trader appears neither wounded nor exhausted. Having spent a good thirty nights in the forests of Quetza Temer, Winterscale has merely swapped his dazzling smile for a feral grin and drenched himself in the blood of his enemies.{/n}
